AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for root login: Checks whether any non-root user exists that has login privileges.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqtcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for TCB: Checks whether TCB is enabled or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for IPSec: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has Trusted Execution feature on or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcefs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for EFS: Checks whether the Centralized EFS feature is supported or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqahafs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for AHAFS: Checks whether the system supports AHAFS or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_manageITsecurity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.1 Management of IT Security: Turns on Trusted Execution policies to stop loading of binaries, scripts, kernel extensions and shared libraries on checksum mismatch with TSD.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_resourceprot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT AI3.2 Infrastructure Resource Protection and Availability: Turns on bin auditing for set of events and disables direct root logins.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_identitymgmt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.3 Identity Management: Ensure the user accounts are authenticated using password based authentication method i.e., remove .rhosts, .netrc, .shosts, .nodes, hosts.equiv, and shosts.equiv files.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_usracctmgmt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.4 User Account Management: Verifies the correctness of user definitions and fixes the errors.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_securitymonitor
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.5 Security Testing Surveillance and Monitoring: Regularly checks the security status of the system against the last applied AIXpert security level.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_erroreporting
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.6 Security Incident Definition: Consolidates errors from different logs and sends mail to administrator.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_protsectech
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.7 Protection of Security Technology: Avoids modifications to trusted files listed in TSD database.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_cryptokeymgmt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.8 Cryptographic Key Management: Stores EFS keystores on a centralized LDAP server.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_virusdetsw
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.9 Malicious Software Prevention Detection and Correction: Malicious Software Prevention Detection and Correction.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_firewsetup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.10 Network Security: Firewall Architecture and Connections with Public Networks.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_xchgsensitivedata
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS5.11 Exchange of Sensitive Data: Enables SSH options to ensure sensitive data transfer is protected.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_configrepomgmt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS9.1 DS9.2 and DS9.3 Configuration Repository Management: Monitors system configuration files for modifications and logs the event data.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_managephyaccess
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS12.3 Physical Access: Disables root console login and enables auto logoff of idle user sessions.

AIXPertEntry.name: scbps_manageprtrsrvc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: COBIT DS13.4 Sensitive Documents and Output Devices: Disables Printer services(qdaemon, piobe and lpd).
